title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, September 13, 2019
description: It was on this day in 1814 that Francis Scott Key was inspired to write the words to "The Star-Spangled Banner.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1814 that Francis Scott Key was inspired to write the words to "The Star-Spangled Banner.”
